com.percussion.cms.objectstore
Class PSItemFieldMeta

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSDbComponent
      com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSItemComponent
          com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSItemFieldMeta
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSCmsComponent, IPSDbComponent, Cloneable
public class PSItemFieldMeta
extends PSItemComponent

An object representation of the StandardItem FieldMeta element. This class contains all of the descriptive elements of the associated element. That associated element may be a field, child, child entry or a related item.

Method Detail

addOptions

public void addOptions(String displayName,
                       String optionValue)
Add options to fields. These supply the elements in the ValueChoices/Options element of the StandardItem.xsd. They will be sorted based on the displayName by the Comparable rules.

Parameters:
displayName - the name that may be used for UI purposes. It may be null or empty. null will be treated as empty.
optionValue - the value that will be persisted. It may be null or empty. null will be treated as empty.

getBackendDataType

public int getBackendDataType()
The data type of the column to which the field value will be persisted. Will be one of the following:
  • DATATYPE_DATE if the backend data type is: date, time or datetime
  • DATATYPE_TEXT if the backend data type is: text, boolean or was not set (default)
  • DATATYPE_NUMERICif the backend data type is: integer or float
  • DATATYPE_BINARYif the backend data type is: binary.

Returns:
return a valid type.

getOptionDisplayNames

public Iterator getOptionDisplayNames()
Returns a list of the display names in the options. With display name you can get the option value by calling getOptionValueByDisplayName .

Returns:
Iterator of Strings that are the display names. May return null if options are empty.

getOptionValueByDisplayName

public String getOptionValueByDisplayName(String displayName)
Return the specified value for a display name.

Parameters:
displayName - Must not be null or empty.
Returns:
the value corresponding to the display name. May be null or empty.

hasOptions

public boolean hasOptions()
Does this PSItemFieldMeta have options?

Returns:
true if there are options, otherwise false.

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Description copied from interface: IPSCmsComponent
Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. All implementing classes must override this method as the default behavior is incorrect for deep clones. If the implementation does not follow the contract documented for this method in Object, then it must clearly state how it deviates from that contract. The following algorithm should be used:
  1. Call the base class (unless Object) and if true is returned, continue.
  2. Compare all members of current class.
  3. If all members are equal, return true.

Specified by:
equals in interface IPSCmsComponent
Specified by:
equals in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
equals in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
obj - the reference object with which to compare. May be null;
Returns:
true if this object is logically equivalent to the supplied obj; false otherwise. If null or not an instance of this class, false is returned.

loadXmlData

public void loadXmlData(Element sourceNode)
                 throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
This method is called to populate an object from its XML representation. It assumes that the object may already have a complete data structure, therefore method only overlays the data onto the existing object. An element node may contain a hierarchical structure, including child objects. The element node can also be a child of another element node.

Specified by:
loadXmlData in class PSItemComponent
Parameters:
sourceNode - the XML element node from which to populate. Must not be null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the XML element node does not represent a type supported by this class.

getName

public String getName()
Returns the unique name of the field.

Returns:
name of the field. Never null or empty.

isMultiValueField

public boolean isMultiValueField()
Is this a multi value field?

Returns:
true if it is.

getSourceType

public int getSourceType()
The source type of the field. Will be one of the following types:
  • SOURCE_TYPE_UNKNOWN - default
  • SOURCE_TYPE_LOCAL
  • SOURCE_TYPE_SHARE
  • SOURCE_TYPE_SYSTEM

Returns:
valid source value.

getTransferEncoding

public int getTransferEncoding()
Gets the transfer encoding type. Will be one of the following types:
  • ENCODING_TYPE_NONE - default. No encoding specified.
  • ENCODING_TYPE_BASE64 - base64 encodes the field value before transfering.

Returns:
transfer encoding of this item. Wwill not be null or empty.

setTransferEncoding

public void setTransferEncoding(int encodingType)
Sets the transfer encoding type. Must be one of the following types:
  • ENCODING_TYPE_NONE - default. No encoding specified.
  • ENCODING_TYPE_BASE64 - base64 encodes the field value before transfering.

Parameters:
encodingType - must be a valid type.

getFieldValueType

public int getFieldValueType()
The field value type of the field. Will be one of the following types:
  • FIELD_VALUE_TYPE_UNKNOWN - default.
  • FIELD_VALUE_TYPE_CONTENT
  • FIELD_VALUE_TYPE_META

Returns:
valid source value.

getFieldDef

public PSField getFieldDef()
The definitions for this fieldmeta, set in the ctor, invariant and never null

getDisplayName

public String getDisplayName()
Returns the display name for this field. A display name is not required.

Returns:
display name may be null never empty.

showInPreview

public boolean showInPreview()
Should we display this field value in preview?

Returns:
true the field value will be displayed in preview mode in the CMS, false it will not be. Default is false.

isBinary

public boolean isBinary()
Is this either a binary field, or a treat as binary field?

Returns:
true if it is, otherwise false.
